title: Hilaria Baldwin flashes a smile as leaves GMA in stellar fall ensemble with her makeup kit in hand
text:
She's the busy mom-of-four with another one on the way.

And Hilaria Baldwin made things look easy on Monday morning when she was spotted in high spirits following her appearance on Good Morning America.

The 35-year-old beauty dressed to impress while walking out of the studios carrying her large makeup kit with her.

Scroll down for video

Starting the week off right! Hilaria Baldwin struggled to wipe the smile off of her face as she left Good Morning America on Monday

Hilaria stunned in a red sweater that she slightly tucked in at the front.

She teamed the look with a pair of form-fitting disco-era tights that had a sheen to them.

The wife of Alec Baldwin completed her ensemble with knee-high boots that featured a large block heel.

Fashionista: The wife of Alec Baldwin completed her ensemble with knee-high boots that featured a large block heel

She wants to look her very best: She shared this image early in the morning

Hilaria's brunette tresses were styled out into a loose wave and her glam kept natural with blushed cheeks and a nude glossy lip.

The Mom Brain podcast host took to her social media earlier in the day to reveal she lugged around her own makeup products when getting her glam done for events or appearances.

'I always bring my own makeup when I shoot because I find so many products are so irritating,' she explained.

Doing it for her skin! The Mom Brain podcast host took to her social media earlier in the day to reveal she lugged around her own makeup products when getting her glam done for events or appearances

'I have to lug it around with me... but my skin thanks me.'

And while Hilaria appeared as though things were all going to plan, she revealed mom duty got in the way and she had to attend to her eldest son Rafael's new broken Statue Of Liberty souvenir.

The family of six spent Sunday being tourists in their own city with Rafa asking for a souvenir of the special day.

Sweet: And while Hilaria appeared as though things were all going to plan, she revealed mom duty got in the way and she had to attend to her eldest son Rafael's new broken Statue Of Liberty souvenir

5th time's a charm! Unfortunately his new purchase appeared to be quite fragile with Hilaria gluing it together four times on Sunday alone

Unfortunately his new purchase appeared to be quite fragile with Hilaria gluing it together four times on Sunday alone.

Monday morning saw her fix it up once again.

'Ready for @goodmorningamerica ...but first let me fix the statue for the 5th time.'

Hilaria and Alec, who married in 2012, have four children together - Carmen, six, Rafael, four, Leonardo, three, and Romeo, 15 months.

Alec is also the dad to Ireland, 23, who he had with his ex-wife, Kim Basinger.
description: Hilaria Baldwin struggled to wipe the smile off of her face as she left Good Morning America on Monday. The 35-year-old was dressed in a sweater top and tights for the appearance.
